DOC.detailed_description: A total 540 patient CIU enrol pivotal , randomise , multicentre , international , double-blind , placebo active-comparator control , parallel study . Patients select public private clinical practice . The study population include male females 18 70 year age , suffer CIU least 6 week prior entry study identifiable cause .
